resources.string: In five minutes the job starts, are you ready?
It\'s time to finish the job
What do you think if we stop for 5 minutes?
What do you think if we make a call?
Check this option if you want to keep the same schedule on all active days

It is important that we start work with full energy. We must have had breakfast, we must have good personal hygiene and we need to get dressed so that our boss understands that we are working. You must have a good environment to be able to concentrate. Try to have good lighting and a good posture to avoid possible back pain.

It\'s a good practice to tell yourself where you ended up so that tomorrow it\'s easier for you to continue. No matter how much work you have, you won\'t finish it today. Do not spend extra hours counting because your body will suffer
Els teus ulls han estat enfocats a la pantalla durant un temps. És recomanable estirar les cames i mirar per la finestra perquè els ulls estiguin enfocats a diferents distàncies i relaxar-se.

Get up, have a glass of water, do some stretching. In 10 minutes of Tai Chi you will move all the muscles of your body, you will appreciate it both physically and mentally and it will be easier to concentrate.
Your family and friends want to know how you are doing. Give them a call! So you disconnect from work and you will enjoy more of your leisure time
What do you think if we stop for 10 minutes?
Take the opportunity to rest and relax your eyes. Talk to whoever you share this time with and don\'t get hooked on a new screen.
